audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: End Users/Desktop

name: Music Obtainer
short_description:
Music Obtainer is a program written in Python using wxPython for its GUI. It is currently being supported on Mac OSX, and Windows 7. The Music Obtainer is supposed to help you download full albums from your favorites bands, and automatically sync it with your iTunes. The project is currently in version 1.0, but will continue to be updated if interest is shown.

Note: You will need to download wxPython for your operating system in order to use this program. No other non-system default libraries should be need. This program was tested and developed on Python 2.7, but should work on any Python 2.X version.
summary: A program designed to help you find and download music.
